name: wasm-worker
description: Move a WebAssembly module into its own thread

scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore cli
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore cli
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.prod src/index.js dist/wasm-worker.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.prod src/index.js dist/wasm-worker.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build

author: Matteo Basso (https://github.com/mbasso)
